survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate patient satisfaction with teleconsultation services provided by healthcare providers, focusing on ease of use, quality of care, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use teleconsultation services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use teleconsultation services?

questions.question_text: Which of the following teleconsultation platforms have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following teleconsultation platforms have you used? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ease of scheduling a teleconsultation appointment?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ease of scheduling a teleconsultation appointment?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the quality of care received during your teleconsultation?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale for consistency. Label all points for clarity.

script.question_text: How would you rate the quality of care received during your teleconsultation?

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced during teleconsultations? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced during teleconsultations? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend teleconsultation services to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend teleconsultation services to others?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for teleconsultation services?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture detailed feedback. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for teleconsultation services?

questions.question_text: Do you feel that teleconsultation saves you time compared to in-person visits?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Include a neutral option.

script.question_text: Do you feel that teleconsultation saves you time compared to in-person visits?

questions.question_text: How important is the availability of teleconsultation services to you?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How important is the availability of teleconsultation services to you?

questions.question_text: Would you prefer teleconsultation over in-person visits for routine check-ups?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Include a neutral option.

script.question_text: Would you prefer teleconsultation over in-person visits for routine check-ups?
